source-layers.sql: SELECT *, CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(zonedist, 3, 1) = '-' THEN LEFT(zonedist, 2) WHEN SUBSTRING(zonedist, 3, 1) ~ E'[A-Z]' THEN LEFT(zonedist, 2) WHEN SUBSTRING(zonedist, 3, 1) ~ E'[0-9]' THEN LEFT(zonedist, 3) ELSE zonedist END as primaryzone FROM zoning_districts_v20181206
SELECT the_geom_webmercator, cartodb_id, sdlbl, sdname FROM special_purpose_districts_v20181206
SELECT cartodb_id AS id, * FROM commercial_overlays_v20181206

meta.description: NYC GIS Zoning Features December 2018, Bytes of the Big Apple
